indian.details: Direct Airside Transit Visa (DATV) usually required. EXEMPT if holding valid US/Can/Aus/NZ/Schengen D visa.

activities.title: Elizabeth Line to Soho
activities.description: New high-speed train gets you to Tottenham Court Rd in 35 mins. Walk to Chinatown/Covent Garden.

activities.title: Windsor Castle
activities.description: The King's home. Very close to Heathrow (20 min taxi). Great for layovers where you don't want to go central.

activities.title: Big Ben & Westminster
activities.description: The classic London view. Tube: Piccadilly Line to Westminster (takes 50 mins).

activities.title: Aerotel London (T3)
activities.description: Landside hotel in T3 arrivals. Good if you have a long overnight wait and visa to enter.

activities.title: Harrods Department Store
activities.description: Luxury shopping in Knightsbridge. Piccadilly Line stops right there.

activities.title: Heathrow Observation Deck (T4)
activities.description: 270-degree views of the runway near Gates 15/16. iPad stations and binoculars.

activities.title: Dishoom Carnaby
activities.description: Famous Bombay Cafe style food. Great breakfast or lunch. Expect queues.

activities.title: Plaza Premium Lounge T2
activities.description: Award-winning lounge. Showers available. Access via Priority Pass.
